title: When NATO Comes To Wales, The Welsh Plan To Relish The Spotlight
teaser: Foreign leaders are descending on Wales for this week's NATO summit, and the influx is a big deal for the small country on the western edge of the UK. Roy Noble of BBC Radio Wales explains just what this means for the region.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
